import { useState } from "react"; const Form = () => { const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ firstName: '', lastName: '', email: '', comments: '', isFriendly: true, employment: '' }); const handleSubmit = e => { e.preventDefault(); } const handleChange = e => { const {name, value, type, checked} = e.target; setFormData(prevFormData => { return { ...prevFormData, [name]: type === 'checkbox' ? checked : value } }); console.log(formData); } return ( <>

React Forms
